titleStmt.title: Die Lunæ, 8. Junii. 1646. It is this day ordered by the Commons now assembled in Parliament, that on the next Lords day the respective ministers of the severall churches, and chappels within the cities of London and Westminster, ...

titleStmt.title: Die Lunæ, 8. Junii. 1646. It is this day ordered by the Commons now assembled in Parliament, that on the next Lords day the respective ministers of the severall churches, and chappels within the cities of London and Westminster, ...

notesStmt.note: Title from heading and first lines of text.
Signed: H. Elsynge Cler. Parl. D. Com.
An order of the Commons that the following Sunday be appointed a thanksgiving day for various Parliamentary successes.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
